description:
Threats of the monetary system and economic growth dependency

Sustainable economy is wishful thinking since our exponentially growing debt requires exponential economic growth. Such an economy is in the end impossible and untenable.

Download video: http://videos.fscons.org/fscons/2013/lilla_horsalen_-_2013-11-09_1200_-_threats_of_the_monetary_system_and_economic_growth_dependency_-_yoshi_frey_-_27.ogv
title: Yoshi Frey: Threats of the monetary system and economic growth dependency
